content: Most common use case for us is getting bulk data from EHRs and in absence of Bulk data API, we are thinking of using resource bundle so I wanted to check if Cerner and/or Epic support getting bundle resources and if anyone has any examples? Thanks in advance
This may be better asked over on the #bulk data stream. Also, no one has this in production today AFAIK: the specification isn't final yet.

Hello Jenni,
Sorry, I didn't see that stream earlier. Thank you for the information
- Pathik
